mapper.insert: insert into notice( notice_no, notice_writer, notice_title, notice_content, notice_writedate, notice_read ) values( notice_seq.nextval, #{noticeWriter}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, sysdate, 0 )
mapper.select: select * from notice order by notice_no desc
mapper.update: update notice set notice_read = notice_read + 1 where notice_no = #{noticeNo}
mapper.select: select * from notice where instr(${type}, #{keyword}) > 0 order by ${type} asc
select count(*) from notice where instr(${type}, #{keyword}) > 0
